Name: ev_type
Description: Event type that the rule is for: '1' = SELECT, '2' =\n UPDATE, '3' = INSERT, '4' = DELETE

Name: ev_class
Description: The table this rule is for

Name: ev_attr
Description: The column this rule is for (currently, always zero\n to indicate the whole table)

Name: is_instead
Description: True if the rule is an INSTEAD rule

Name: ev_qual
Description: Expression tree (in the form of a nodeToString\n representation) for the rule's qualifying condition

Name: ev_action
Description: Query tree (in the form of a nodeToString\n representation) for the rule's action
